room_title: Escape room "The Jungle" by 11th Hour Escape in Corpus Christi
review: Our family recently tried the newest escape room with a great jungle theme. The puzzles were challenging yet doable and very satisfying to solve. The room itself is decorated well; amazing atmosphere. So much fun! Definitely recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Jungle" by 11th Hour Escape in Corpus Christi
review: I have done 11th Hour Escape rooms in the past and had an amazing time then, so it's not surprising that the newest Jungle edition went beyond expectations. They're doing a wonderful job here and I would recommend it to anyone.

room_title: Escape room "The Jungle" by 11th Hour Escape in Corpus Christi
review: We got to experience the new Jungle Room, and we were not disappointed! It has a great theme with excellent decor and interesting and challenging puzzles! I loved the flexible difficulty option. This is a fantastic family and team building activity right here in Corpus Christi. After you do one of the rooms, I am sure you will want to go back again to experience the others. Highly recommended.
